forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun drapes its golden light across Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere is imbued with a gentle warmth and a sense of clarity. Today, vibrant blue skies stretch endlessly, punctuated only by the occasional lazy cloud. The air is crisp yet comforting, making the temperature, hovering near sixty-seven degrees, feel just right for a late afternoon walk. If you listen closely, the pleasant whispers of a westward breeze, nudging along at around fifteen miles per hour, add an invigorating touch to the otherwise serene backdrop. 

As daylight wanes, the forecast promises a tranquil evening, with temperatures dipping to a restful fifty-six. The evening sky will remain partly cloudy, but it is unlikely to cloak the stars for those who look up. A light jacket will suffice for the cooler moments, especially as you may want to linger outdoors, perhaps enjoying a simple stroll along the Embarcadero or stopping by a quaint café for coffee and a bite. With the absence of fog and a cheerful palette of blues, the scene speaks to an inviting charm, one that beckons you to pause, breathe, and simply appreciate the unfolding day.
